description: This blueprint represents a Datadog incident in our software catalog
title: datadogIncident

customerImpactScope.title: Customer Impact Scope
customerImpactScope.description: A summary of the impact customers experienced during the incident.

customerImpacted.title: Customer Impacted
customerImpacted.description: A flag indicating whether the incident caused customer impact.

customerImpactStart.title: Customer Impact Start
customerImpactStart.description: Start time of incident affecting customer

customerImpactEnd.title: Customer Impact End
customerImpactEnd.description: End timestamp of incident affecting customers

timeToDetect.title: Time To Detect
timeToDetect.description: Number of seconds it took to detect incident

timeToRepair.title: Time To Repair
timeToRepair.description: Number of seconds it took to fix incident

createdBy.title: Created By
createdBy.description: Name of user that created this incident
